alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 13 at 4:01AM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Jefferson county. Greatest accumulations over the southeast portion of the county, with the lowest amounts close to Lake Ontario and the Saint Lawrence River. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult at times with snow covered roads and poor visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
